statements: SELECT * FROM identity_theft_fake_identities;
SELECT id, fake_name FROM identity_theft_fake_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT fake_address FROM identity_theft_fake_identities WHERE fake_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, fake_name, fake_address FROM identity_theft_fake_identities ORDER BY fake_name ASC;
SELECT fake_name, fake_phone_number FROM identity_theft_fake_identities WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_fake_identities WHERE fake_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT fake_address, fake_phone_number FROM identity_theft_fake_identities WHERE fake_ssn LIKE '123%' ORDER BY fake_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_fake_identities FROM identity_theft_fake_identities;
SELECT fake_name, fake_ssn, fake_phone_number FROM identity_theft_fake_identities WHERE fake_address = '123 Main St' OR fake_address = '456 Elm St';
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_fake_identities WHERE fake_phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY fake_name, fake_address;
SELECT * FROM fake_identities;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM fake_identities;
SELECT id, address, credit_score FROM fake_identities ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_history WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT full_name, credit_card_number, loan_amount FROM fake_identities INNER JOIN financial_history ON fake_identities.id = financial_history.fake_identity_id;
SELECT id, full_name FROM fake_identities WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM fake_identities ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, address, loan_amount FROM fake_identities JOIN financial_history ON fake_identities.id = financial_history.fake_identity_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_history WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY account_number ASC;
SELECT full_name, credit_card_number FROM fake_identities WHERE address LIKE '%California%' ;
SELECT * FROM Identity_theft;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Identity_theft ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT address, date_of_birth FROM Identity_theft WHERE id = 1;
SELECT annual_income, credit_score FROM Financial_Records WHERE annual_income > 50000;
SELECT applicant_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM Credit_Applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Identity_theft WHERE date_of_birth = '1990-05-10';
SELECT * FROM Financial_Records WHERE annual_income > 50000 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT applicant_id, loan_amount FROM Credit_Applications WHERE credit_card_limit < 1000 AND loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Identity_theft WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT id, credit_score, annual_income, outstanding_debts, employment_status FROM Financial_Records WHERE employment_status = 'Employed';
SELECT * FROM identity_thieves;
SELECT name, address FROM fake_identities WHERE fake_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT id, name, social_security_number FROM identity_thieves WHERE address = '123 Main St' AND social_security_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM identity_thieves;
SELECT name, address FROM identity_thieves WHERE social_security_number = '123-45-6789';
SELECT fake_name, fake_address FROM fake_identities ORDER BY fake_name ASC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_status FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, address FROM users WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, employer, job_title, income FROM employment ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY card_number ASC;
SELECT user_id, amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY interest_rate;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM users WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT address, name FROM users WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM loans WHERE interest_rate > 5.00;
SELECT user_id, employer, income FROM employment WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
